existing_features.title: Create a single-page policy website for the compressor app that is accessible at a clear route (e.g., "/policy") and renders as the primary content of the app.

Add well-structured, English policy content sections with clear headings and placeholder text that the user can easily edit: Effective Date, Privacy Policy, Data Collection & Usage, Data Sharing, Data Retention, Security, Childrenâ€™s Privacy, User Rights/Choices, Changes to This Policy, and Contact Information.

Add basic site chrome suitable for a policy page: a top header with the app name ("Compressor") and a simple in-page table of contents linking to each policy section; include a footer repeating contact information and the effective date.

Establish a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the policy site (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across headings, links, cards/sections, header, and footer (avoid blue/purple as the primary palette).

Ensure the policy page has basic accessibility and metadata: semantic HTML structure (proper heading order), visible focus states for links, and document title/description appropriate for a policy page.
Ensure the deployed site works correctly when users land directly on both "/" and "/policy" (no blank page or routing error on refresh), and that "/" continues to redirect to "/policy" in production.
